roleset.name: impelled action

example.name: preposition and passive
example.text: [We]-1 were railroaded *trace*-1 into signing the agreement.

roleset.note: RAILROAD-V NOTES: Frames file for 'railroad' based on ectb and verb 'force'. (from railroad.01-v predicate notes)

roleset.name: force a thing

example.name: typical
example.text: They managed to swiftly railroad the bill through the stunned council session.

example.name: just arg2
example.text: It *EXP* will be virtually impossible for the KMT to railroad through legislation under the leadership of a president who *T* doesn't enjoy majority support.
example.arg: under the leadership of a president who *T* doesn't enjoy majority support.

roleset.note: RAILROAD-V NOTES: Frames file for 'railroad' based on ectb and verb 'force'. (from railroad.02-v predicate notes)
